duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, including executing the food program and setting an example for the staff.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire staff, delegate tasks, and provide follow-up to ensure completion.
Provide regular and predictable onsite attendance and display a sense of urgency, patience, and leadership.
Handle cash, bookkeeping, problem-solving, advocating, and empathizing, and ensure safety and security at the store.
